thread.title: Robert Bond Jr
thread.title_full: Precision Tax Relief reviewed by Robert Bond Jr

author: Robert Bond Jr
title: Robert Bond Jr
text: My case had 5 years of unfiled business taxes and owed in the 6 figures . They Guided me to being compliant and got the IRS off my back .I no longer live in fear of garnishment Or Levies.They let me pay in monthly payments which was a life saver. I am very grateful and highly recommend their services.
